Class OceanusUnits

java.lang.Object
net.sourceforge.joceanus.oceanus.decimal.OceanusDecimal
net.sourceforge.joceanus.oceanus.decimal.OceanusUnits
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<OceanusDecimal>
public class OceanusUnits extends OceanusDecimal
Represents a Units object.
